alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette; Henry (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 7:52PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Fayette, southwestern Henry and central Clayton Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 752 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Flippen, or near McDonough, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Jonesboro, Stockbridge, Riverdale, Hampton, Morrow, Lovejoy, Lake Spivey, Blacksville, Bonanza, Luella, Atlanta Motor Speedway, Jw Smith Reservoir, Flippen, Eagles Landing and Irondale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
